statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{5 \, x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} + 3 \, x - 5 , -24 \, x^{3} + 24 \, x^{2} - 8 \, x + 44 , 12 \, x^{3} - 12 \, x^{2} + 4 \, x - 22 , x^{3} - 2 \, x^{2} - x - 6 , -27 \, x^{3} + 30 \, x^{2} - 5 \, x + 62\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
